document.full_text: the miami heat and dallas mavericks did indeed meet in the 2006 finals, but the changes within both franchises -- and the league at large -- since that time makes the thought of the 2011 finals as a "rematch" a bit ridiculous.
document.title: dispatching the worn narrative of the 2006 finals
lines_and_colors: the miami heat and dallas mavericks did indeed meet in the 2006 finals, but the changes within both franchises -- and the league at large -- since that time makes the thought of the 2011 finals as a "rematch" a bit ridiculous.
